sql_code:
WITH filtered_balls AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM hdata_new_schema -- Replace with your actual table name
  WHERE insert_condition_here
),

individual_innings AS (
  SELECT 
    match_id, -- Keep match_id internally for HS, 50s, 100s calculation
    batsman_name,
    SUM(actual_runs) AS runs, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_wide = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS balls_faced, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_wicket = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS outs, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN actual_runs = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fours, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN actual_runs = 6 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sixes, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN actual_runs = 0 AND is_wide = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dots 
  FROM filtered_balls
  WHERE batsman_name IS NOT NULL -- Ensure name exists for grouping
  GROUP BY match_id, batsman_name -- Group by match and name for per-innings stats
),

individual_batting_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    batsman_name AS player_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT match_id) AS innings_played, -- Count distinct matches the player batted in
    SUM(runs) AS total_runs,
    SUM(balls_faced) AS total_balls_faced,
    SUM(outs) AS total_outs,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_faced) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(runs) * 100.0 / SUM(balls_faced)) 
    END AS strike_rate,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(outs) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE SUM(runs) * 1.0 / SUM(outs) 
    END AS batting_average,
    MAX(runs) AS highest_score,
    SUM(CASE WHEN runs >= 50 AND runs < 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fifties,
    SUM(CASE WHEN runs >= 100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS hundreds,
    SUM(fours) AS total_fours,
    SUM(sixes) AS total_sixes,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_faced) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(dots) * 100.0 / SUM(balls_faced)) 
    END AS dot_percentage
  FROM individual_innings
  GROUP BY batsman_name -- Final aggregation by player name only
)

SELECT 
  player_name,
  innings_played,
  total_runs,
  total_balls_faced,
  total_outs,
  ROUND(CAST(batting_average AS NUMERIC), 2) AS average,
  ROUND(CAST(strike_rate AS NUMERIC), 2) AS strike_rate,
  ROUND(CAST(dot_percentage AS NUMERIC), 2) AS dot_percentage,
  highest_score AS hs,
  fifties,
  hundreds,
  total_fours,
  total_sixes
FROM individual_batting_stats
ORDER BY total_runs DESC;
sql_description: Aggregates individual batting stats grouped by 'batsman_name'. Uses 'actual_runs'. Counts non-wides as balls faced. Calculates standard metrics like average, strike rate, HS, 50s, 100s. Does not use player IDs.

sql_code:
WITH filtered_balls AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM hdata_new_schema -- Replace with your actual table name
  WHERE insert_condition_here
),

team_innings AS (
  SELECT 
    match_id, -- Keep match_id internally for highest score calculation
    batting_team,
    SUM(runs) AS total_runs_scored, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_wide = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS balls_faced, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_wicket = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wickets_lost,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_four = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fours, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_six = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS sixes, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_dot = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dots 
  FROM filtered_balls
  WHERE batting_team IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY match_id, batting_team
),

team_batting_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    batting_team,
    COUNT(DISTINCT match_id) AS matches,
    SUM(total_runs_scored) AS total_runs,
    SUM(balls_faced) AS total_balls_faced,
    SUM(wickets_lost) AS total_wickets_lost,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_faced) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(total_runs_scored) * 100.0 / SUM(balls_faced)) 
    END AS team_run_rate_per_100_balls, 
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(wickets_lost) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE SUM(total_runs_scored) * 1.0 / SUM(wickets_lost) 
    END AS team_runs_per_wicket, 
    MAX(total_runs_scored) AS highest_team_score_in_innings,
    SUM(fours) AS total_fours,
    SUM(sixes) AS total_sixes,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_faced) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(dots) * 100.0 / SUM(balls_faced)) 
    END AS dot_percentage
  FROM team_innings
  GROUP BY batting_team
)

SELECT 
  batting_team,
  matches,
  total_runs,
  total_balls_faced,
  total_wickets_lost,
  ROUND(CAST(team_runs_per_wicket AS NUMERIC), 2) AS team_average,
  ROUND(CAST(team_run_rate_per_100_balls AS NUMERIC), 2) AS team_strike_rate,
  ROUND(CAST(dot_percentage AS NUMERIC), 2) AS dot_percentage,
  highest_team_score_in_innings AS highest_score,
  total_fours,
  total_sixes
FROM team_batting_stats
ORDER BY total_runs DESC;
sql_description: Aggregates team batting stats grouped by 'batting_team'. Uses 'runs' (including all extras). Calculates team average (runs/wicket) and strike rate (runs/100 balls). Does not use team IDs.

sql_code:
WITH filtered_balls AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM hdata_new_schema -- Replace with your actual table name
  WHERE insert_condition_here
),

individual_bowling_spells AS (
  SELECT 
    match_id, -- Keep match_id internally for grouping spells
    bowler_name,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_bowler_wicket = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wickets, 
    SUM(actual_runs + CASE WHEN is_wide = TRUE OR is_no_ball = TRUE THEN extras ELSE 0 END) AS runs_conceded,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_wide = FALSE AND is_no_ball = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS balls_bowled, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN actual_runs = 0 AND is_wide = FALSE AND is_no_ball = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dot_balls, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN actual_runs >= 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS boundary_balls_off_bat 
  FROM filtered_balls
  WHERE bowler_name IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY match_id, bowler_name
),

individual_bowling_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    bowler_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT match_id) AS innings_bowled, 
    SUM(wickets) AS total_wickets,
    SUM(runs_conceded) AS total_runs_conceded,
    SUM(balls_bowled) AS total_balls_bowled,
    SUM(dot_balls) AS total_dot_balls,
    SUM(boundary_balls_off_bat) AS total_boundary_balls_off_bat,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(wickets) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE SUM(runs_conceded) * 1.0 / SUM(wickets) 
    END AS bowling_average,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_bowled) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(runs_conceded) * 6.0 / SUM(balls_bowled)) 
    END AS economy_rate,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_bowled) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(dot_balls) * 100.0 / SUM(balls_bowled)) 
    END AS dot_ball_percentage,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_bowled) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(boundary_balls_off_bat) * 100.0 / SUM(balls_bowled)) 
    END AS boundary_off_bat_percentage
  FROM individual_bowling_spells
  GROUP BY bowler_name -- Final aggregation by bowler name only
)

SELECT 
  bowler_name,
  innings_bowled,
  total_wickets,
  total_runs_conceded,
  total_balls_bowled,
  ROUND(CAST(bowling_average AS NUMERIC), 2) AS average,
  ROUND(CAST(economy_rate AS NUMERIC), 2) AS economy_rate,
  ROUND(CAST(dot_ball_percentage AS NUMERIC), 2) AS dot_ball_percentage,
  ROUND(CAST(boundary_off_bat_percentage AS NUMERIC), 2) AS boundary_percentage 
FROM individual_bowling_stats
ORDER BY total_wickets DESC;
sql_description: Aggregates individual bowling stats grouped by 'bowler_name'. Uses 'is_bowler_wicket'. Calculates runs conceded as 'actual_runs' + extras from wides/no-balls. Counts legal deliveries. Calculates standard metrics. Does not use bowler IDs.

sql_code:
WITH filtered_balls AS (
  SELECT *
  FROM hdata_new_schema -- Replace with your actual table name
  WHERE insert_condition_here
),

team_bowling_innings AS (
  SELECT 
    match_id, -- Keep match_id internally for grouping innings
    bowling_team,
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_wicket = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS wickets_taken,
    SUM(runs) AS runs_conceded, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_wide = FALSE AND is_no_ball = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS balls_bowled, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN runs = 0 AND is_wide = FALSE AND is_no_ball = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS dot_balls, 
    SUM(CASE WHEN is_four = TRUE OR is_six = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS boundaries_conceded 
  FROM filtered_balls
  WHERE bowling_team IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY match_id, bowling_team
),

team_bowling_stats AS (
  SELECT 
    bowling_team,
    COUNT(DISTINCT match_id) AS matches,
    SUM(wickets_taken) AS total_wickets_taken,
    SUM(runs_conceded) AS total_runs_conceded,
    SUM(balls_bowled) AS total_balls_bowled,
    SUM(dot_balls) AS total_dot_balls,
    SUM(boundaries_conceded) AS total_boundaries_conceded,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(wickets_taken) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE SUM(runs_conceded) * 1.0 / SUM(wickets_taken) 
    END AS team_bowling_average,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_bowled) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(runs_conceded) * 6.0 / SUM(balls_bowled)) 
    END AS team_economy_rate,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_bowled) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(dot_balls) * 100.0 / SUM(balls_bowled)) 
    END AS team_dot_ball_percentage,
    CASE 
      WHEN SUM(balls_bowled) = 0 THEN NULL 
      ELSE (SUM(boundaries_conceded) * 100.0 / SUM(balls_bowled)) 
    END AS team_boundary_percentage
  FROM team_bowling_innings
  GROUP BY bowling_team
)

SELECT 
  bowling_team,
  matches,
  total_wickets_taken,
  total_runs_conceded,
  total_balls_bowled,
  ROUND(CAST(team_bowling_average AS NUMERIC), 2) AS team_average,
  ROUND(CAST(team_economy_rate AS NUMERIC), 2) AS team_economy_rate,
  ROUND(CAST(team_dot_ball_percentage AS NUMERIC), 2) AS team_dot_ball_percentage,
  ROUND(CAST(team_boundary_percentage AS NUMERIC), 2) AS team_boundary_percentage
FROM team_bowling_stats
ORDER BY total_wickets_taken DESC;
sql_description: Aggregates team bowling stats grouped by 'bowling_team'. Uses 'runs' (including all extras) for runs conceded. Counts legal deliveries bowled. Calculates team average, economy, dot%, boundary%. Does not use team IDs.
